mapper.insert: insert into al_menu (menu_id, menu_name, url, parent_id, sort_num, icon, create_date) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortNum,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update al_menu set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort_num = #{sortNum,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=BIGINT} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name, url, parent_id, sort_num, icon, create_date from al_menu
